description.raw:
Simple example on how to use a UI file with a plugin. UI files are in XML, [here](http://doc.qt.io/qt-5.9/designer-ui-file-format.html)'s the schema.

UI files can be generated using [Qt Designer](http://doc.qt.io/qt-5/qtdesigner-manual.html), a tool for visually building Qt objects.

One way to install Qt Designer on Ubuntu is by installing the Qt Creator IDE:

`sudo apt install qtcreator`

And then you can run Qt Designer:

`designer`
